entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
